a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average years of schooling, males vs. females
Average number of years adults over 25 years participated in formal education.
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2025)
Note: Formal education is primary/ISCED 1 or higher. This does not include years spent repeating grades.
